data.insert: Explore the red planet with our exclusive weekend packages. Whether you're a science enthusiast, a student, or just looking for an adventure that's out of this world, we have something for everyone.

insert.image: /api/v1/images/Crazy Ideas/Weekend Trips to Mars/Ticket Prices & Special Discounts/ca572518-a178-4d0a-a928-8950ef0c6104.png

data.insert: : $350,000 for two - Share the journey with a loved one and save!
: $800,000 for a family of four - Make it a family getaway and save even more!
: 30% off - In recognition of your contribution to expanding human knowledge, all verified scientists and researchers can enjoy a significant discount.

(Ages 10-18): 50% off - Inspire the next generation of explorers with a hands-on learning experience like no other.

   Group Discounts

: 20% off per person - The more, the merrier, and the cheaper! Gather friends or colleagues for an unforgettable excursion.

   Early Bird Special

Book your trip 6 months in advance and receive an additional 10% off.

Additional Information

.
       - Accommodation in our state-of-the-art Martian habitat.
       - All meals and activities, including spacewalks and Mars rover expeditions.

:
       - Travel insurance (highly recommended).
       - Souvenirs and personal expenditures.

Booking and Cancellation Policy
A 50% deposit is required at the time of booking, with the remaining balance due

.

Cancellations made up to 45 days before departure will receive a full refund minus a 10% administration fee. Cancellations made within 44 to 15 days of departure will receive a 50% refund. No refunds will be issued for cancellations made less than 15 days before departure.
